thread.title: SRK fit enough to resume work immediately
thread.title_full: SRK fit enough to resume work immediately - The Times of India

author: Sunayana Suresh
title: SRK fit enough to resume work immediately
text:
Sandalwood's Century Star Shivarajkumar was discharged from hospital at around 11.30 am on Thursday morning. He was accompanied by his wife Geetha, brother-in-law Madhu Bangarappa and a few close associates from the industry.
Speaking to us, producer Tarun Shivappa said, "Shivanna (as he is fondly referred to by friends and colleagues) is absolutely fine. In fact, the doctors have told him that he can resume work immediately if he wants to, and that there's no restriction on his diet either." The actor has been filming Santeyalli Ninta Kabeera and Killing Veerappan, which are slated to be his next releases.
